title: Sports and Entertainment Event Schedule
description: For Live Event schedule data, such as a traveling concert schedule or a sports team's schedule.

xdm:locationID.title: Location ID
xdm:locationID.description: Unique identifier for the Location in which the event is taking place.

xdm:attractionName.title: Attraction Name
xdm:attractionName.description: Name of the attraction(s) at the event

xdm:eventClassification.title: Event Classification
xdm:eventClassification.description: Describes the type of event, e.g., sports, music

xdm:eventSubClassification.title: Event Sub Classification
xdm:eventSubClassification.description: Describes the sub-type of the event. For example, if the classification is sports, the sub-classification might be the type of sport (baseball).

xdm:premiumDoorTime.title: Premium Door Time
xdm:premiumDoorTime.description: Door open time for premium ticket holders.

xdm:regularDoorTime.title: Regular Door Time
xdm:regularDoorTime.description: The time the doors open for non-premium ticket holders.

xdm:ticketsAvailable.title: Tickets Available
xdm:ticketsAvailable.description: Indicates if tickets are still available for the event or not.

xdm:eventSeasonName.title: Season Name
xdm:eventSeasonName.description: Descriptive name of the event season, if it is an event within a series. For example, a sports season.
